title: What is this black screen that I get
body: I have just lost a lot of RP and got a wait because of this new client. I keep getting black screens and load into the champ select screen, it happens every game but now its not even working at all, and just stays at a black screen, I can not ban or do anything, and lose LP it has happened twice. Please I just want my points bac

replies.body:
Are you still experiencing this or has this been resolved? We deployed a hotfix for Black Screen issues in the Beta Client that happened specifically in the transition between the queue and champ select.

We can't modify your LP, as the system was designed that way to prevent abuse, but if you have any other issues just let me know.
Hey sorry for the late reply but yea this has been fixed for me, but now i seem to be having some weird client lag. Ill collect somemore data and get back to you

Just chiming in, I had this happen twice approximately 1-1.5 hours ago.  Same thing as OP described, I load into the champ select screen after hitting accept and I can still hear all of the sounds but I cannot click anything and the screen is entirely black.  I can click on the buttons to close the client etc. but I cannot interact with champ select at all.  Also I'm on a Mac if that matters at all.
Is this happening on Both Clients for you, or just on the Beta Client? Try both clients and let me know if anything changes.
I have only been using the Beta Clients.  I'll give the legacy client a try and see what happens.
Had this happen 3 minutes ago. It has happened 4 or 5 times since the patch.

Its really shitty that I go into this game get black screened not just once but twice on Ranked, but hey I can always count on Riot to help me get back to where I was right? No? Oh so I get to enjoy this timer of waiting because of a problem that's not my fault and I get the punishment for it?! On top of this wonderful Leaverbuster timer! Maybe Riot should think of refunding those LP's or implementing a system that doesn't have their player base getting punished not once but twice for nothing.

Happening to me as well. Only on the new client.

Had this happen about 10 minutes ago and received a long LeaverBuster queue.  Is there a workaround for this?
